local_schema.short_desc: Whether to hibernate, suspend or do nothing when inactive
local_schema.longdesc: The type of sleeping that should be performed when the computer is inactive. Possible values are "hibernate", "suspend" and "nothing".

local_schema.short_desc: If the battery event should occur when the lid is shut and the power disconnected
local_schema.longdesc: If the battery lid close event should occur (for example 'Suspend when lid closed on battery') when the lid is previously shut and the AC power disconnected at a later time.
